text: EA-2192 is an extremely toxic degradation product of the VX nerve agent.Hoenig, Steven L. (2007), Compendium of Chemical Warfare Agents, Springer, It is a white solid that is very soluble and stable in water. EA-2192 is an extremely potent acetylcholinesterase inhibitor. It is almost as toxic as VX itself. ==See also== *Nerve agent *VX (nerve agent) ==References== Category:V-series nerve agents Category:Phosphonothioates Category:Phosphonic acids Category:Acetylcholinesterase inhibitors Category:Diisopropylamino compounds
title: EA-2192
